title: Big bass

properties.name: description
properties.value: A big bass is an abnormally large bass caught while big net fishing at any big net/harpoon fishing spot. Since players can only get it while fishing for bass, it requires 46 Fishing to catch. Players have a 1/1000 chance per bass caught to instead receive a big bass.[1] Catching one prompts the message "You catch an enormous bass!" instead of the usual "You catch a bass."

A big bass is an abnormally large bass caught while big net fishing at any big net/harpoon fishing spot. Since players can only get it while fishing for bass, it requires 46 Fishing to catch. Players have a 1/1000 chance per bass caught to instead receive a big bass.[1] Catching one prompts the message "You catch an enormous bass!" instead of the usual "You catch a bass."

It can be mounted in a Skill Hall in a player-owned house. Before it can be mounted, it must be stuffed by the Taxidermist in Canifis, where she will charge 1,000 coins and return a stuffed big bass to the player. They can then mount the fish using 2 oak planks. When players take it to the Taxidermist, she will exclaim "That's a mighty fine sea bass you've caught there."

A big bass may be cooked into a regular bass for the standard cooking experience.

Bug:
Rada's blessing and spirit flakes are reported by Jagex Moderators not to provide an extra big bass.[2] However, players have reported this to occur, likely due to a bug.[3]

References[edit | edit source]

  1. ↑ Jagex. Mod Ash's Twitter account. 13 April 2015. (Archived from the original on 26 March 2019.) Mod Ash: "Bass = 1/1000. Swordfish = 1/2500. Shark = 1/5000."
  2. ↑ Jagex. Mod Ash's Twitter account. 24 March 2020. (Archived from the original on 25 March 2020.) Mod Ash: "No."
  3. ↑ Emperor95. You can get two Big Bass via Rada's blessing, despite what the wiki/Mod Ash states. Reddit. 23 September 2021. Note the multiplication message in the chatbox.

[[File:Big bass detail.png|left|130px]]
A '''big bass''' is an abnormally large [[raw bass|bass]] caught while [[Big fishing net|big net fishing]] at any big net/harpoon fishing spot. Since players can only get it while fishing for bass, it requires 46 [[Fishing]] to catch. Players have a 1/1000 chance per bass caught to instead receive a big bass.{{CiteTwitter|author=Mod Ash|url=https://twitter.com/JagexAsh/status/587574469616476162|date=13 April 2015|archiveurl=https://archive.fo/n49Su|archivedate=26 March 2019|quote=Bass = 1/1000. Swordfish = 1/2500. Shark = 1/5000.}} Catching one prompts the message "You catch an enormous bass!" instead of the usual "You catch a bass."

It can be [[Mounted bass|mounted]] in a [[Skill Hall]] in a [[player-owned house]]. Before it can be mounted, it must be stuffed by the [[Taxidermist]] in [[Canifis]], where she will charge 1,000 coins and return a [[stuffed big bass]] to the player. They can then mount the fish using 2 [[oak plank]]s. When players take it to the Taxidermist, she will exclaim ''"That's a mighty fine sea bass you've caught there."''

A big bass may be cooked into a regular [[bass]] for the standard cooking experience.

{{bug|[[Rada's blessing]] and [[spirit flakes]] are reported by Jagex Moderators not to provide an extra big bass.{{CiteTwitter|author=Mod Ash|url=https://twitter.com/JagexAsh/status/1242545371798286337|date=24 March 2020|archiveurl=https://archive.fo/Cppij|archivedate=25 March 2020|quote=No.}} However, players have reported this to occur, likely due to a bug.{{CiteReddit|author=Emperor95|url=https://www.reddit.com/r/2007scape/comments/ptwywb/you_can_get_two_big_bass_via_radas_blessing/|title=You can get two Big Bass via Rada's blessing, despite what the wiki/Mod Ash states|quote=|date=23 September 2021|archiveurl=|archivedate=|notes=Note the multiplication message in the chatbox.|name=}}}}
